page.title: 02VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Balsall Common has lot of activities to offer for all age groups. For children there are cubs,guides,scouts and brownie groups there are also dancing classes such as ballet,tap and disco. There are lots of sporting activities like football, cricket, rugby, ,tennis, judo and karate. For adults there are night classes at the Heart of England school which consist of sporting, practical and academic teaching. As well as the night classes there is a mother and toddler club. There is a game of bingo for everyone each week. Balsall Common has a lot of old people so there are activities for them as well. There is the friends in retirement club,the pensioners luncheon club C.A.M.E.O. which stands for "come and meet each other" and Darby and Joan club. Emma James
